field.name: partner_id
field.context: { 'res_partner_search_mode': type == 'opportunity' and 'customer' or False, 'default_name': contact_name or partner_name, 'default_is_company': type == 'opportunity' and contact_name == False, 'default_company_name': type == 'opportunity' and partner_name, 'default_phone': phone, 'default_email': email_from, 'default_user_id': user_id, 'default_team_id': team_id, 'show_vat': True}

field.name: partner_id

field.name: partner_id

button.name: mail_action_blacklist_remove
button.title: This email is blacklisted for mass mailings. Click to unblacklist.
